comments.text:
Maybe just copy-paste some parts from the just updated Help content:

Uncheck "Personalize add-on recommendations" in Edit > Preferences > Advanced > Software Installation. Disabling this option will also suppress contacting the add-on site periodically for any new information about installed add-ons, but won't affect automated updates.
